      • expand

        public void expand(double dx,
          double dy,
          boolean asRatio)
        Expand scales the size of the Envelope. If asRatio = FALSE, the expansion is additive (XMin = XMin - dx, YMin = YMin - dy, XMax = XMax + dx, YMax = YMax + dy). If asRatio = TRUE, the expansion is multiplicative (XMin = XMin - dx*Width/2, YMin = YMin - dy*Height/2, XMax = XMax + dx*Width/2, YMax = YMax + dy*Height/2). The Envelope remains centered at the same position.
        ָ����:
        expand �ڽӿ��� IEnvelope
        ����:
        dx - ����x���ӡ�
        dy - ����y���ӡ�
        asRatio - ���ձ������ű�־��Ϊfalse�����ձ������ž����ࡣ����dx��0.2����asRatio��false������ο����С��ԭ����80����Ϊtrue����ֱ�Ӽ����������ӡ����� dx��0.2����asRatio��true�����¾��ο�ȣ�ԭ���ο�ȣ�2��0.2
